display_long_description:
Control remote airplanes to freely fly or engage in combat with another plane in mixed reality or virtual reality.  
Supports customizable 3D models (e.g., Gundam, Macross, Robotech,Star Wars, Star Trek, etc.) and VR scenes (e.g., SpaceX, etc.) for upload and application.
*****

it is designed specifically for those who want to enjoy the thrill of flying anytime, anywhere. It's incredibly stress-relieving. Not only can you fly in the real world, but you can also switch to different environments like parks, beaches, and countryside fields. You can even upload your own 360-degree photos for an exhilarating flight experience. The models come in various sizes, and can be scaled up to full size, making for a truly breathtaking experience that typical RC plane enthusiasts can't match. When the plane flies too far, a simple button press will bring it back to you instantly—an easy return feature that is hard to find in regular RC models and is usually only available in expensive drones.

In reality, adding missiles or jet engines to a model requires a lot of money and technical skill. FlyMe lets you experience all this without the hassle. In the VR environment, you can walk around as if you're outdoors, enhancing your mood. A Jupiter ball is randomly included for interaction with the plane. Additionally, 
Fly seamlessly between virtual and real worlds, whether you're a beginner or an experienced player.
